title: 3v3 ranked For Oce?
body: Just Wondering When 3v3 Ranked For OCE starts, because its been ages since OCE's Been released and yet we haven't had any opportunity to have 3v3 ranked.

replies.body: The main reason I think we do not have 3v3 is that riot has just made OCE a test server{{champion:32}} , Ocean Week was a test and we smashed it over in a think 1 and a half days and the same thing would happen with 3v3 ranked even when they briefly turned it on by "accident" I saw the looking for group chat light up and had around a 10 second que time to find a game. No one can say we dont have the population because we clearly do.{{summoner:31}}

Why does population matter so much? 
I'm sure once it gets up and running more people will join in
Please riot make it happen :D

That's a bit dodgy, i don't see why the population matters. Like gimme a free transfer to Na if you want to take away half the game. T.T, Dominion, 3v3 ranked. It is stable enough so bring it out riot!

We haven't had the opportunity because our server population has barely grown.

For us to have Ranked 3v3 we need our population to at least double. So go out and get all your friends and their friends and their friends friends to join and play as much or more than you do.
Because unless if we get a large stable server population we wont be getting 3v3 ranked.
